overview: The encounter between comics, music and cinema in a context of independent art production in São Paulo, Brazil, between the 1970's and the 1980's. From the musical performances of Arrigo Barnabé to the pioneer comic book Balão (Baloon), the movie approaches the experimentation in the work of a generation of Brazilian artists and the way in which the humor and the horrors of their reality were presented in their compositions. In a quite similar way as the productions themselves, the short movie has an independent and creative approach too, using the own interviewees to narrate and intervene in the film's narrative.
title: Fury Film
